segments.text: I notice the little girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s not even trying to help her brother balance on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s just as reckless as he is, even if she’s not climbing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far that he’s about to fall backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve ever been caught taking cookies before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely unaware of what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how bold these kids are being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to collapse under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to get in so much trouble if they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, not even trying to stop him.
segments.speaker: PAR
